posts.title: 我的github博客
posts.text: 欢迎来到我github博客，刚刚创建不久，后期将不断更新.. 项目基本架构库1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677ext { android = [ compileSdkVersion: 25, buildToolsVersion: "25.0.2", minSdkVersion : 17, targetSdkVersion : 25, versionCode : 15, versionName : "1.7.0", ] version = [ androidSupportSdkVersion: "25.3.0", retrofitSdkVersion : "2.2.0", dagger2SdkVersion : "2.10", butterknifeSdkVersion : "8.5.1", rxlifecycleSdkVersion : "1.0", espressoSdkVersion : "2.2.2", canarySdkVersion : "1.5" ] appName = "checksheet" dependencies = [ //support "appcompat-v7" : "com.android.support:appcompat-v7:${version["androidSupportSdkVersion"]}", "design" : "com.android.support:design:${version["androidSupportSdkVersion"]}", "support-v4" : "com.android.support:support-v4:${version["androidSupportSdkVersion"]}", "cardview-v7" : "com.android.support:cardview-v7:${version["androidSupportSdkVersion"]}", "annotations" : "com.android.support:support-annotations:${version["androidSupportSdkVersion"]}", "recyclerview-v7" : "com.android.support:recyclerview-v7:${version["androidSupportSdkVersion"]}", "constraintLayout" : "com.android.support.constraint:constraint-layout:1.0.2", //network "retrofit" : "com.squareup.retrofit2:retrofit:${version["retrofitSdkVersion"]}", "retrofit-converter-gson" : "com.squareup.retrofit2:converter-gson:${version["retrofitSdkVersion"]}", "retrofit-adapter-rxjava" : "com.squareup.retrofit2:adapter-rxjava:${version["retrofitSdkVersion"]}", "okhttp3" : "com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp:3.6.0", "okhttp-urlconnection" : "com.squareup.okhttp:okhttp-urlconnection:2.0.0", "okhttp3-interceptor" : "com.squareup.okhttp3:logging-interceptor:3.6.0", //view "butterknife" : "com.jakewharton:butterknife:${version["butterknifeSdkVersion"]}", "butterknife-compiler" : "com.jakewharton:butterknife-compiler:${version["butterknifeSdkVersion"]}", "photoview" : "com.github.chrisbanes.photoview:library:1.2.3", "nineoldandroids" : "com.nineoldandroids:library:2.4.0", "glide-transformations" : "jp.wasabeef:glide-transformations:2.0.2", "glide" : "com.github.bumptech.glide:glide:3.8.0", "lottie" : "com.airbnb.android:lottie:2.0.0'", //rx "rxandroid" : "io.reactivex:rxandroid:1.2.1", "rxjava" : "io.reactivex:rxjava:1.2.9", "rxlifecycle" : "com.trello:rxlifecycle:${version["rxlifecycleSdkVersion"]}", "rxlifecycle-components" : "com.trello:rxlifecycle-components:${version["rxlifecycleSdkVersion"]}", "rxbinding-recyclerview-v7": "com.jakewharton.rxbinding:rxbinding-recyclerview-v7:1.0.1", "rxpermissions" : "com.tbruyelle.rxpermissions:rxpermissions:0.9.3@aar", //tools "dagger2" : "com.google.dagger:dagger:${version["dagger2SdkVersion"]}", "dagger2-compiler" : "com.google.dagger:dagger-compiler:${version["dagger2SdkVersion"]}", "otto" : "com.squareup:otto:1.3.8", "gson" : "com.google.code.gson:gson:2.8.0", "multidex" : "com.android.support:multidex:1.0.1", "javax.annotation" : 'javax.annotation:jsr250-api:1.0', "utilcode" : "com.blankj:utilcode:1.7.1", "BaseRVHelper" : "com.github.CymChad:BaseRecyclerViewAdapterHelper:2.9.22", "eventbus" : 'org.greenrobot:eventbus:3.0.0', "logansquare" : 'com.bluelinelabs:logansquare:1.3.4', "logansquareCompile" : 'com.bluelinelabs:logansquare-compiler:1.3.4', "logansquareConverter" : 'com.github.aurae.retrofit2:converter-logansquare:1.4.1', "lombok" : 'org.projectlombok:lombok:1.16.18', //creash report "crashreport" : 'com.tencent.bugly:crashreport_upgrade:1.3.1', //test "junit" : "junit:junit:4.12" ]} More info: Writing Deploy to remote sites本章节结束….. posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
